columns.language_id: The unique identifier for each language.
columns.country_id: The unique identifier for each country where the language is official.

official_languages.table_description: The table links official languages to their respective countries.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each language.
columns.name: The name of the language in text format.

languages.table_description: The table lists languages along with their unique identifiers.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each country.
columns.name: The name of the country in text format.
columns.overall_score: The aggregated score reflecting the country's overall performance.
columns.justice_score: The score measuring the fairness and equality in the country.
columns.health_score: The score assessing the health standards and services in the country.
columns.education_score: The score evaluating the quality of education in the country.
columns.economics_score: The score representing the economic stability and growth of the country.
columns.politics_score: The score indicating the political stability and governance in the country.

countries.table_description: The table provides scores assessing various aspects of countries.
